name: select_race_based_on_id
description:
This is a sub-function API for tool f1_race_schedule.
Tool description: This API provides the user with up-to-date dates and timings for all the races in the ongoing F1 season.
API description: Fetches the details of a specific race using its ID from the F1 race schedule API.

is_id.description: The ID of the race to fetch details for.
